title: Organum vetus & novum, or, A discourse of reason and truth wherein the natural logick common to mankinde is briefly and plainly described / by Richard Burthogge ... in a letter to the most Honourable Andrew Trevill, Esq. ...
author: Burthogge, Richard, 1638?-ca. 1700.
notes: Running title: A discourse of truth and reason.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
